Server.Name: Standard Edition
Server.Description:
If you're a fan of Resident Evil, and more specifically, the Remake of the original, then you should give this overhaul mod a go!
Recommended settings: Default settings can be found by clicking the link below.
PLEASE NOTE: This was designed for single player, however, it can be played in multiplayer.
https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/23270-the-spencer-mansion-incident-challenge-mode-version-111d/
I'm looking for translations. Current supported languages: English, Japanese.
